Author: sharpshoot
Content:
Hey Dave, great to meet you too. While we're in the san francisco area we hope to do another one of these meetups. Just leave a message if this would be of interest and any feedback you had on making it better.

Everybody is welcome for the next one which we will put on soon :) shoot me an email.

Author: BitGeek
Content:
LOL, I love guys like Joel Spolsky-- self anointed gurus handing out really terribly advice to uncritical lemmings.... this reduces competition in the marketplace for those of us who think (and have experience.)

Joel is like one of those infamous Lieutenants in Vietnam-- all book learning and zero experience getting people killed-- usually to get fragged by one of their own. Since fragging is uncommon in cubicle farms, Joel still lives.

Author: dawie
Content: I am in Calgary too. Lets have a Calgary meetup!!!

Author: ed
Content: Agreed. It looks like the author got a few press releases and decided to include whoever came to mind first.
